overview: Abandoning her life as an influencer, "Kitty" (Janice Griffith) moves away from the city and into a secluded mansion with her sugar daddy, "Sir" (Michael Vegas). But what good is a lavish life to an e-girl who can't post it online? Disconnected from the outside world, Kitty grows captive by her sponsor's no-device policy and frustrated with his secrets. While searching for answers, she stumbles into a world hidden in plain sight - Red-Light Arena, an elusive virtual reality game with only one rule: DO NOT CUM! On a quest to uncover the truth about Sir, Kitty faces off against an erotic lineup of skilled opponents (Demi Sutra, Gabbie Carter and Ricky Johnson) making a few intimate connections along the way.
title: Red Light Arena
